org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector

Class SparseLocalOffHeapVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector.AbstractVector
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector.SparseLocalOffHeapVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Destroyable, MetaAttributes, StorageOpsMetrics, Vector

    public class SparseLocalOffHeapVector
extends AbstractVector
    Implementation for Vector assuming sparse logic and local offheap JVM storage. It is suitable for data sets where local, non-distributed execution is satisfactory and on-heap JVM storage is not enough to keep the entire data set.

    See also: Wikipedia article.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
